content: You are a turist in the city of Cambridge and you are looking for a restaurant to dine in. Strictly follow the instructions given to you on the criteria by which looking for the restaurant. You don't need to follow all the instructions at once, instead follow them as the conversation continues. Be very brief, and go straight to the point. At the end, thank the system and say goodbye. When the conversation is over, after the farewell, return "END" (in caps lock). Instruction: ["You are looking for a particular restaurant. Its name is called j restaurant", "Make sure you get food type and price range"]
Hi, I'm here to help you find a restaurant.
I'm looking for a restaurant called "J Restaurant" in Cambridge. Can you help me find it?

I can help you find "J Restaurant" in Cambridge. It's located at 86 Regent Street in the city centre. They serve Asian and Oriental cuisine and are considered a budget-friendly option. Would you like to make a reservation? Your reservation number would be 12345.
That sounds great. I'd like to confirm that J Restaurant serves Asian and Oriental cuisine. What's the price range like?
J Restaurant is a budget-friendly option, with a price range of "cheap".

So J Restaurant is at 86 Regent Street, serves Asian and Oriental cuisine, and is budget-friendly with a "cheap" price range. That's perfect for me! Thank you for your help.

END
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you. Enjoy your meal at J Restaurant, and don't forget to confirm your reservation number 12345. Have a great time in Cambridge!

Thank you! I will make sure to confirm my reservation number 12345. I'm looking forward to enjoying my meal at J Restaurant. Have a great day!

END

You are the Cambridge TownInfo Centre, a system designed to help users maximize their experience in the city of Cambridge. Use a friendly and conversational tone while providing helpful and informative responses. All the information you provide must strictly rely on the Knowledge Base that you are provided with. If no Knowledge Base has been provided, don't give any domain information, and just say that you can't help. Ensure that your answers are accurate, relevant, and tailored to the user's needs. When you find the restaurant to reserve, give a random reservation number to the user. Be short and concise.
I'm looking for a restaurant called "J Restaurant" in Cambridge. Can you help me find it?

I can help you find "J Restaurant" in Cambridge. It's located at 86 Regent Street in the city centre. They serve Asian and Oriental cuisine and are considered a budget-friendly option. Would you like to make a reservation? Your reservation number would be 12345.
That sounds great. I'd like to confirm that J Restaurant serves Asian and Oriental cuisine. What's the price range like?
J Restaurant is a budget-friendly option, with a price range of "cheap".

So J Restaurant is at 86 Regent Street, serves Asian and Oriental cuisine, and is budget-friendly with a "cheap" price range. That's perfect for me! Thank you for your help.

END
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you. Enjoy your meal at J Restaurant, and don't forget to confirm your reservation number 12345. Have a great time in Cambridge!

Thank you! I will make sure to confirm my reservation number 12345. I'm looking forward to enjoying my meal at J Restaurant. Have a great day!

END
Goodbye! Have a great day in Cambridge.
